website_summaries.verdict: The travel-friendly X100 is one of the better micro wireless speakers, featuring decent sound for its size, an attractive design, and speakerphone capabilities.
pros: The Logitech X100 is a compact, hockey-puck-size wireless Bluetooth speaker that has a built-in lithium ion rechargeable battery and offers decent enough sound for its size
It's nicely designed, has speakerphone capabilities, and a line input for non-Bluetooth devices
cons: Can distort a little at higher volumes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a cheap toss-around alternative to Bose and I'm finding that I use it more and really get more enjoyment from my music and podcasts with it than the more expensive and seemingly fragile stuff. I hang it places I'd have never thought to put a speaker as I working in the warehouse or on cars, and it's great! I'd love a way to link multiple of these together, even if they are on the same channel. There is really something to be said for battery power here... I have and enjoy daily whole-home Sonos, but for work this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good speaker. The charge lasts long and it's easy to work. (Keeping a charge was an issue with previous speakers I had purchased.) I wish it was louder, but at the same time it's a small speaker, and sounds good for the size. (I'm just being picky!) You can't really take your device too far from the speak before the bluetooth connection starts to fade, but I always keep my phone close, and with that it works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: HGS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: This sounds surprisingly awesome. Like everyone says, you're not going to rattle your windows with bass, but this has a nice full range sound for such a small speaker. Great for camping or doing chores around the house when you're away from a stereo/computer. Paired really easily with my iPhone and iMac, and you can switch between devices with little to no delay.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you cannot go wrong! This little speaker has great sound quality and a good range from the source. The battery life is also impressive!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this to replace my wonderful older Logitech speaker that I just wore out but I’m terribly disappointed in it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace my wonderful older Logitech speaker that I just wore out. This speaker is ok but when pairing with my phone it contantly cuts off when a call or text comes in on my phone and it has to be re-paired. Quite annoying. Other than that - great sound for a small speaker - very portable - would probably be better suited if paired with a lap top or iPad (unless you are texting from it)
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Value for money with great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I have JBL clip 1 as well and I clearly see the difference between loudness of these two. I prefer this over JBL as my JBL started giving distorted sound despite of being known for good sound quality. This is my second speaker after I bought the same last year and impressed with the sound. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend uses these speakers all the time! I ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend uses these speakers all the time! I brought it for him for Christmas and uses it to blast his music! Small speaker with a loud performance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase. I've had one in my van. I purchased this one for the house. Great product and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mekami7

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says good
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom, 78y. She loves it. Good sound and easy to operate. The size and weight are perfect for a mobile speaker 🔊 . She has it in her apartment and in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Good sound from such a small speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I use it at work and it's perfect... 8 straight hours without having to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Nyra Toledo

customer_reviews.title: Logitech X100 Speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are great little speakers. I've bought 4 of them now. Two for myself for different rooms in the house, and two for friends. They're solid, very simple to use, the battery has good long life after a charge, and the sounds is really nice. For @$20 I can't imagine something much better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing. Small
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Small, good sound and really high value for money. Battery lasts longer than expected. Usually about 6-9 hours depending on usage.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Adil

customer_reviews.title: Logitech bears the name of good quality products
customer_reviews.text: Logitech bears the name of good quality products. It has a good quality sound for a better price as compared to similar speakers on sale. I recommend this to buy.
customer_reviews.author: EMY

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the money. Even the bass comes through well!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the sound. Easy to use with bluetooth. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Z million

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and good play time of battery.
customer_reviews.text: Excelent, I use the speaker everyday in my job connected to my phone by Bluetooth. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound for a lil bugger.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound for this lil bugger. I've been using it indoors and outdoors - hiking and camping.
customer_reviews.author: endlessknot

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my best friend. He needed a speaker to hook up ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my best friend. He needed a speaker to hook up to his laptop. He said the sync was easy and works great..
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Liked it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the money, but not the greatest range.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing. Sounds really loud and the bass response is pretty good. I use it all the time at my job.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Really good sound quality considering the size and price of this ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound quality considering the size and price of this item. As mention on other comments, the issues that i faced are with range and stuttering (but that could be due to interference on my house).
customer_reviews.author: Billy Y.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great speaker, plays music clearly and the volume level ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker, plays music clearly and the volume level is great. It is small and easy to take where ever you need it. After purchasing one, we now have three. Kids were fighting over it. Great speaker!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Fills a room with clear sound easily. Great for travel. The battery alone deserves 5 stars. This speaker is easy to use, easy to pair and it gets loud, but my only con is...with some songs, the louder it gets, it can (not with all) sound a little (only a little) muffled. Great buy and I would purchase again. Used primarily for listening to jazz, rhythm & blues, and podcasts while on a cruise(s).
customer_reviews.author: T. Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Nice little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little speaker! Perfect for small areas or listening to music on the patio, good over all sound. Not much bass but it still sounds full, and for the price they are selling these for now, you cannot beat it. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J Walker

customer_reviews.title: Seems like I received one that is broken down
customer_reviews.text: Seems like I received one that is broken down. My speaker is fully charged, and my phone works well with bluetooth. However, speaker keeps on stop playing music every like 10 seconds. It really seems broken, and I hate this is happening to me when this product has such a high rating. It sucks to have a speaker that doesn't produce right sound. Any fix can be done??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this portable speaker it's so easy to carry around ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this portable speaker it's so easy to carry around anywhere and sound quality is beasttt
customer_reviews.author: oshin

customer_reviews.title: Good morning, it's unfortunate for me to find that ...
customer_reviews.text: Good morning, it's unfortunate for me to find that the full speakers did not come, I had requested three and I got two in the box .... I would like to know a solution. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unpair from other devices or it will pair to everything!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker for its size and it's March of 2018 I bought this thing two years ago and it's still working fine and as loud as the first day I bought it and has survived some serious falls and still works. It's a little pair monster because it'll immediately upon being turned on will pair to any every device it has paired with before at the same time and makes priority whichever was recent and so it jumps between paired devices which can get a little annoying so unpair from other things!
customer_reviews.author: Martin-Louis Knoxx

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment compared to the LogitechX50
customer_reviews.text: What happened? I had the Logitech x50. It was amazing. Bought the x100 thinking it would be same sound output with added mic for speakerphone as well. So they are doing some kind of sound filtering that is removing all the richness of the songs. Maybe it's the plastic speaker cover. The x50 had a cloth mesh. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: nibin a

customer_reviews.title: Good price and sound for this little guy.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for it's small size. Great price. Very portable. Good looks. Decent battery like. Obviously not going to pump out big bass, but you know that given it's small size. I'd buy 2 if it could link 2 together for stereo sound, but it doesn't seem to offer that. Disappointing to find that Logitech didn't design that capability into it.
customer_reviews.author: srf

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SOUND AT A GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I really like this speaker, it is very portable and sturdy with a surprisingly good sound, nice bass and mids and sounds very clear even at it loudest volume, I would've liked it to be louder but I guess you get what you pay for, for the price this is a really good Bluetooth speaker that I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Antfitgodd

customer_reviews.title: Nice music coming out from this small and cheaper speaker
customer_reviews.text: Nice music coming out from this small and cheaper speaker. My iPhone, the source of music and the speaker could not that be much far away like my Bose portable. Approximately 20 to 30 feet away from each other. I like the thinner yet whole sound for relaxation, nothing to quake my system. I like it, I am practicing frugality in a way, but to me this is a worth it item.
customer_reviews.author: gwen martinez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND for price and size!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the sound on my iPad mini2 was really weak and I LOVE it! It has amazing sound for the price and size of it compared to other small Bluetooth speakers I've had. I definitely recommend this speaker if you're looking for an affordable Bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: N Watts

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, the sound is really good and easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Reinoso

customer_reviews.title: Worth for money.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of product built is fine. Range is good. Battery life is ok for that size of compact speaker . Sound is realy clear even on max volume. Good sound on midrange and lowrangei abit poor on bass. What can i say more. Go get it...
customer_reviews.author: mr.yasoo

customer_reviews.title: great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: great little speaker. Perfect for on the porch while I'm in the yard working. Use it in the bathroom while showering.
customer_reviews.author: catherine viers

customer_reviews.title: ... have received a defective one but it wasn't very good. The JBL is more expensive but sounds much ...
customer_reviews.text: I may have received a defective one but it wasn't very good.The JBL is more expensive but sounds much better.
customer_reviews.author: mek

customer_reviews.title: Best value for a speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Unexpectedly loud, nice sound. It's a small item so don't expect the moon, be reasonable. Great product, buy a carabiner clip so you can hook it on something to walk around.
customer_reviews.author: O3one

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much that I got 2!
customer_reviews.text: I love my portable speakers. Great quality sound, easy to carry, goes everywhere with me and battery does last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Vet Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker with a lot of volume
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker with a lot of volume. Have yet to totally run the battery down even after a good 5 hours of use. I would highly recommend this speaker if you need a small portable speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pair with your cell phone and nice sound. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: R. Reich

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy build. Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is the bomb. Comparable to speakers in higher price range. It holds charge forever too. Sturdy build. Reccomend highly
customer_reviews.author: Aaron McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: for this price you can not go wrong ! these are high quality speaker at a low price
customer_reviews.author: Kmedina

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, fast shipping and a cute NY Knicks color. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Nixx

customer_reviews.title: good deal for the money, rugged.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them. good deal for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many Bluetooth speakers and will considef x100 a very great bang for the bucks. Setup is super easy and the sound quality is really good for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Bahador

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely would recommend. Sounds great in a room or outside. No distortion on the bass like other speakers
customer_reviews.author: Dylan McK

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, didn't expect the good quality for the price. Sound quality is good, it has a ruberized surface that feels very good, and friendly sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Maria Filippis

product_meta.title: Logitech X100 Mobile Wireless Speaker (Orange)
feature_bullets: Great acoustics with clear highs, mids and bass
Compact portable design with wrist and backpack cord
Control volume & calls from mobile phone
